detectors.description:
Dragonball.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#78-84) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#79)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#81)

detectors.description:
allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#11)
	- Dragonball.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#68-70)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#12)
	- Dragonball.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#92-97)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#13)
	- Dragonball.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#86-90)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#14)
	- Dragonball.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#64-66)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#16)
	- Dragonball.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#72-74)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#32)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Dragonball.sol#32-34)
